title: Application Metadata Schema
description: Metadata which defines a Hermes Application and is carried inside the Hermes Application Package.

$schema.title: Application Metadata Schema Reference
$schema.description:
Reference to the Application Metadata Schema.
Should be to https:// this will be validated.
Local references are only to simplify development.

icon.title: Application Icon
icon.description:
Path inside the Application to its Icon.
Must be a `.svg` file.

about.title: Application About
about.description: Long form Description of the Application

src.title: Links to the source of this application.
src.description:
Can be links to code repositories or the Authors website.
Specifying any `src` is Optional, however if defined, then these URLs must be reachable when the Application is packaged.

copyright.title: Application Copyright
copyright.description:
List of Copyright Notices/Claims over the Application.
If no copyright is claimed then there should be an explicit statement about the Application being in the public domain.

license.title: Application License
license.description:
List of Licenses/Claims over the Application.
Must declare at least `spdx` or `file`, `note` is Optional.
If `file` is specified it must exist within the Package for the Application to be valid.

items.$comment: Validation Should be one or both of `spdx` and `file` and `note` is optional.

spdx.title: License SPDX ID
spdx.description:
SPDX ID of the License.
In the case of proprietary or non SPDX licenses, do not specify a SPDX ID and just include a license file.

file.title: License File
file.description:
Path to the License File inside the Package.
Must be a `.txt` file and it must exist at Package creation time.
File MUST be text, displayable using monospaced fonts and no line exceeds 80 characters.

note.title: License Note
note.description:
Note about the License.
For Example: Could limit the license to a particular aspect of the Application or part of the code.

build_date.title: Application Build Date
build_date.description:
Unix Epoch Timestamp of when the Application was packaged or built.
This field will be overwritten if present, by the Hermes packaging system.
The field is required, but this will be checked when the package is validated.

file-storage.title: Application File Storage Allocation
file-storage.description: File Storage Allocation of the Application

minimum.title: Application Minimum File Storage
minimum.description:
Minimum File Storage of the Application.
Size is in MegaBytes.

requested.title: Application Requested File Storage
requested.description:
Requested File Storage of the Application.
Size is in MegaBytes.

maximum.title: Application Maximum File Storage
maximum.description:
Maximum File Storage of the Application.
Size is in MegaBytes.

sqlite-db.title: Application SQLite DB Storage Allocation
sqlite-db.description: SQLite DB Storage Allocation of the Application

minimum.title: Application Minimum SQLite DB Storage
minimum.description:
Minimum SQLite DB Storage of the Application.
Size is in MegaBytes.

requested.title: Application Requested SQLite DB Storage
requested.description:
Requested SQLite DB Storage of the Application.
Size is in MegaBytes.

maximum.title: Application Maximum SQLite DB Storage
maximum.description:
Maximum SQLite DB Storage of the Application.
Size is in MegaBytes.

admin.title: Application requires Admin Privileges
admin.description: Does the application require Admin Privileges.
